meanings.definition: In a foolish or unintelligent manner.
meanings.sent1: She asininely believed that the moon was made of cheese.
meanings.sent2: He asininely forgot his keys inside the locked car.
meanings.sent3: The cat asininely tried to catch its own tail, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: The student asininely thought he could pass the test without studying.
meanings.sent5: The clown asininely juggled rubber chickens instead of balls.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of common sense or judgment.
meanings.sent1: It was an asininely decision to wear flip-flops in the snow.
meanings.sent2: The asininely idea of swimming with sharks scared everyone.
meanings.sent3: The asininely plan to build a sandcastle in the rain quickly failed.
meanings.sent4: Her asininely choice of words offended the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The asininely behavior of the puppy made everyone laugh.
